weekly_top_story.headline: NATO launches ‘Eastern Flank’ defense after Russian drones enter Poland
weekly_top_story.summary: NATO has initiated new defense measures on its Eastern Flank in response to Russian drone incursions into Poland, signaling heightened security concerns in Eastern Europe and an escalation in NATO-Russia tensions.

stories.headline: Canada announces $80 million tariff relief for Atlantic Canadian businesses
stories.summary: Prime Minister Mark Carney pledges significant federal funding to mitigate the impact of prolonged tariffs on Atlantic Canada’s economy, aiming to stabilize local businesses and regional trade.

stories.headline: Six killed in Jerusalem bus stop shooting amid Israel-Gaza conflict escalation
stories.summary: Two Palestinian gunmen attacked a Jerusalem bus stop killing six Israelis before being killed themselves, intensifying conflict tensions as Israel vows a strong response against Hamas.
